glsa.title: Bacula: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Bacula may allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information.

background.p: Bacula is a network based backup suite.

description.p: Bacula does not properly enforce console access control lists.

impact.p: A remote authenticated attacker may be able to bypass restrictions to obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Bacula users should upgrade to the latest version:
